object.property: Syntax: For numeric types: N Exactly this number N..M Range between two numbers ? Unknown initial value > or + Increased values < or - Decreased values = Unchanged values != Changed values > N Greater than N < N Less than N + N Increased by N - N Decreased by N != N Other than N where N could be a number of a simple math expression embraced by (), e.g. 12 0x34 5.67 (- 8 * 9) For bytearray: use 2-char hexadecimal notation for each byte, separated by spaces e.g. FE DC BA 98 76 54 32 10 ?? can be used as a wildcard value For string: enter the string directly
Basic: Fastest but may miss some values Normal: Works for most cases Full: Never miss values but slowest
